sn55.7:7.2: BB renders “damage my welfare with false speech”, which seems overly vague. The term attham bhanjati seems to only occur in this context, should it not have a meaning that applies to false speech? By analogy with the other passages, I take me as genitive here.
sn55.7:9.2: BB has “address’, but samudacarati usually has a negative sense of” beset, plague', etc.
